statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.1}+{8.05}\right)}={26.3}\approx{26.3}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{8.05}\cdot{4.85}={39.0425}\approx{39}.
